title: Higher capital expenditure will keep economic revival going, says Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman - Firstpost
content: Higher capital expenditure will keep economic revival going, says Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman  Firstpost
description: The central government in the Union Budget on Tuesday announced a sharp increase of 35.4 per cent in the capital expenditure to Rs 7.50 Iakh crore in the financial year 2022-2023, around 2.9 per cent of the GDP
